articles.title: Instagram is working on a TikTok-style vertical feed for Stories - The Verge
articles.description: Instagram is developing a vertical TikTok-style feed for Instagram Stories, TechCrunch reports. The change isn’t being tested yet, but leaked screenshots suggest stories could behave a lot more like Reels in the future.
articles.content:
The companys TikTok competitor, Reels, already uses the concept
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
